actions.description: The professor makes two Spatial Blade attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: {@atk ms,rs} 7 to hit (the target can't benefit from cover less than total cover), reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage, or 22 (4d8 + 4) force damage if the professor is Large or larger, and the professor can push the target horizontally up to 10 feet away.
actions.name: Spatial Blade

actions.description:
The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: guidance, mage hand, mending (as an action)

1/day each: creation (as an action), dimension door, mage armor, plant growth, polymorph
actions.name: Spellcasting
